thread.title: This is where Chelsea can really punish Arsenal - Marcel Desailly
thread.title_full: This is where Chelsea can really punish Arsenal - Marcel Desailly

title: This is where Chelsea can really punish Arsenal - Marcel Desailly
text: This is where Chelsea can really punish Arsenal - Marcel Desailly EX-CHELSEA captain Marcel Desailly believes Arsenal will face big problems when his old team counter-attack. PUBLISHED: PUBLISHED: 04:50, Fri, Feb 3, 2017 The Gunners travel to Stamford Bridge for their crucial Premier League title showdown tomorrow (12.30pm). And victory for Chelsea would all-but end Arsenal’s hopes of being crowned champions for another year. The Blues lead the way by nine points heading into the weekend, following Tuesday’s 1-1 draw at Liverpool . Antonio Conte has his side organised in their 3-4-3 set-up, which has proven to be effective breaking forward. GETTY Marcel Desailly believes his former club Chelsea will punish Arsenal tomorrow Chelsea has this capacity to really control the game Marcel Desailly Only Arsenal and Liverpool have scored more league goals this season, and Desailly points to the hosts’ ability to punish teams as key ahead of the London derby. "Arsenal is having a problem because they have possession of the ball all the time but they don't make the difference," Desailly told FourFourTwo . "When you are facing Chelsea you are have a problem because Chelsea has this capacity to really control the game, handle the pressure the opponent will put on them and have a great transition from defence to make the difference up front with Diego Costa.” GETTY Marcel Desailly feels Chelsea can flourish on the counter with Diego Costa against Arsenal David Luiz's outrageous celebration after cheeky free-kick against Liverpool Wed, February 1, 2017 David Luiz let it all out after scoring a belting free-kick for Chelsea in their 1-1 draw against Liverpool at Anfield
